metadata.name: Model
metadata.description: A Model object represents a trained model. You can train it by using or ask for predictions with .

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

metadata.name: get
metadata.description:
Get a model if it exists.

You may optionally use this to "get or create" an object by providing an object with autoCreate set to true. Any extra configuration that is normally required for the create method must be contained within this object as well.

params.name: options.autoCreate
params.description: • Automatically create the object if it does not exist. Default: false

params.name: callback.metadata
params.description: • Metadata of the model from the API.

metadata.name: setMetadata
metadata.description:
Sets the metadata of the Model object.

NOTE: What you probably want is , which wraps this method.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

metadata.name: analyze
metadata.description: Get an analysis of the model and the data it was trained on.

params.name: callback.analysis
params.description: • The results of the analysis. See a Trainedmodels: analyze response object.

params.name: callback.analysis.data
params.description: • Analysis of the data stored in this model.

metadata.name: createWriteStream
metadata.description:
Create a writable stream to train the model with new data.

This is a wrapper around .

params.name: label
params.description: • The output value, either a regression or class label.

metadata.name: query
metadata.description: Query the stored data in your model.

examples.caption: Assuming this is a model used to return a language name that matches any given input, this will ask for the prediction results of an english sentence.

params.name: input
params.description: • Input feature(s) to query on the model.

params.name: callback.results
params.description: • An organized set of results from the prediction.

params.name: callback.results.scores
params.description: • Sorted from highest-to-lowest, all of the results that matched the query.

metadata.name: train
metadata.description: Update the stored data with new input.

params.name: label
params.description: • The output value, either a regression or class label.

params.name: input
params.description: • The input features for this data entry.
